```
}
```

post.summary: Deletes a list Item.
Retrieves the paged list of list items, suitable for a grid.
Retrieves the details of a listItem.
Creates or updates a listItem.

Sets the parent of a listItem.
NOTE: List Type is required for the cache to be cleared. This should be obsoleted.
Deletes an editable list.

Retrieves the list of lists that are editable, without their list items.
The grid in the lists manager calls this API.
Retrieve a list by its id. The list's items are included.
Retrieve a list by its type. The list's items are included.

Retrieves the editable details of the given list.
The lists manager uses this API for edit.
Retrieve a list by its type. The list's items are included.
Retrieve a list by its type. The list's items are included.
Saves an editable list.

parameters.description:
# Request body samples
---
**Get details by SequenceNumber**
```
{
"SequenceNumber": 87913,
"DoNotLock": true
}
```
---
**Get details by ticket Id**
```
{
"Id": "05cdece8-c2d9-481a-8474-b8cfaf86c473",
"DoNotLock": true
}
```

post.summary:
Used to create or update the entity based on the value of the Id.
If the ID is null, we create, else we update.
Invoked by zapier to test user credentials.
Invoked by zapier to create a ticket.

Invoked by zapier to register a hook.
A hook is an http address to notify when something happens on our side.
Like for telling them a new ticket was created in Atom.
Invoked by zapier to unregister a hook.

get.summary:
Returns the definition and data of a public dashboard.
No user control validation is performed, thus this call doesn't need a token.

AdjustResourcesViewModel.description: Viewmodel used for adding/removing resources from a C2Client.

Adjustment.description:
Number of resources to add/remove from the C2Client.
Use positive value to add, negative to remove.

C2ClientId.description: Id of the C2Client for which the license should be modified.

Secret.description:
Secret key of the caller. Only callers authorized by C2 should have a secret.
If many callers are authorized, they should have different secrets in order to differenciate them.

AppFeature.description: Functions in the application that require authorization.

Client.description:
A client is the end user who calls the call center because he needs support.
A client may be part of a Client Enterprise which is the client of C2 client or he can be a person calling for
support.
Example:
- A client can work at Helico Montreal which is the client of Zion Communication which purchased C2 application.
- A client can be an independant person who's using cell phones from Zion Communication.

ClientDetailsViewModel.description: ViewModel used to retrieve details / edit a client.

CatalogId.description: Gets or sets the catalog identifier.

CountryId.description: Gets or sets the country identifier.

HasPortalAccess.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance has portal access.

HomePhone.description: Gets or sets the home phone.

IsResource.description: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this instance is resource.

MobilePhone.description: Gets or sets the mobile phone.

NewPassword.description: Gets or sets the new password.

OfficePhone.description: Gets or sets the office phone.

PostalCode.description: Gets or sets the postal code.

PreferedCulture.description: Gets or sets the prefered culture.

ProvinceId.description: Gets or sets the province identifier.

RoleId.description: Gets or sets the role identifier.

StreetName.description: Gets or sets the name of the street.

UserName.description: Gets or sets the name of the user.

ClientSummaryViewModel.description: ViewModel used for clients grid view.

IsDeletable.description: Indicates if the list can be deleted.

IsEditable.description: Indicates if the list can be edited or have its listItems edited.

SortTypeField.description: Use the SortType enum .tostring() until we upgrade to EF5 + framework 4.5

Enterprise.description:
Enterprise represent the organization to which a calling client belongs to.
Example:
Helico Montreal is a Enterprise that belongs to Zion Communication C2Client.

ExtendLicenseViewModel.description: Viewmodel used for extending a subscription.

C2ClientId.description: Id of the C2Client for which the license should be extended.

Duration.description: ExtensionDuration by which the license should be extended.

Secret.description:
Secret key of the caller. Only callers authorized by C2 should have a secret.
If many callers are authorized, they should have different secrets in order to differenciate them.

IsClosing.description: When IsClosing is set to true, this status will close the ticket.

IsDeleting.description: When IsDeleting is set to true, this status will delete the ticket.

IsMandatory.description:
When set to true, the status is mandatory and MUST be part of the workflow for
the specified ticket type.

SuspendLicenseViewModel.description: Viewmodel used for suspending the license of a C2Client.

C2ClientId.description: Id of the C2Client for which the license should be suspended.

Secret.description:
Secret key of the caller. Only callers authorized by C2 should have a secret.
If many callers are authorized, they should have different secrets in order to differenciate them.

SystemFieldData.description: Associates a status or a transition to a TicketField.

DefinitionType.description:
Custom Field Supported Types
IMPORTANT: Add to the end.
The order is important because JS Labels and custom field's journal use the numeric value.
